stories.headline: The Kushners needed a bailout for Jared's bad bet in N.Y., but still have a full portfolio in Jersey
The Kushners needed a bailout for Jared's bad bet in N.Y., but still have a full portfolio in Jersey

familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received None (or less than $201) in (income type not disclosed) income from K 30 JOURNAL Manager Corp. (Undeveloped Real Estate in Jersey City, NJ) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.

familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $15,001 - $50,000 in Rent or Royalties income from K 30 JOURNAL SQUARE, LLC (Undeveloped Real Estate in Jersey City, NJ) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Manager of 30 Journal Square Partners, LLC from Jan 1, 2013, to Jan 1, 2017.

Trump's senior adviser. Because there is no indication his interest in this entity has been divested or placed into a blind trust, it is marked in this database as an active potential conflict of interest.
